name: Night Agency
tagline: Advertising Agency in New York, New York
description:
Night Agency is a 50 person team (and growing) of the most passionate, gifted, competitive, optimistic, curious and innovative people you'll ever meet.
Working out of its downtown NYC office, Night offers end-to-end solutions for its clients most often as their Digital Agency of Record, however in some instances Night will work on a project basis if the fit is right. Dedicated to doing the very best work for its clients, Night recognizes that every brand is unique and every business has its own objectives, resulting in no two projects being similar and making Night an incredibly exciting and dynamic place to work.
